Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to certain housing accommodations by tenants over sixty-two years of age or a tenant with a disability
Summary: Relates to rent regulated and rent stabilized housing accommodations by tenants over sixty-two years of age or a tenant with a disability.
LawCode: Amd §5, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd §§26-403 & 26-511, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to certain housing accommodations by tenants over sixty-two years of age or tenants with a disability
